Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 110th overall pick, by Toledo in 1969...
Injured on 6/22/1971 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 5/10/1972 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/11/1974 with a Bruised Neck, out for 4 days...
Injured on 7/30/1975 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/12/1976, off David Crandell (Min)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/26/1976, off Pedro Segarra (Min)...
Signed as a free agent by Penn on 2/9/1982 to a 3-year deal worth $600,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Longport on 2/7/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $380,000 per year...
